messages.content: Will call and fix up a meeting need your adviosry service. Thank you.
Hi , krishna you can connect with Mr.Ratna kiran ,7661-063355,He can help you with your enquiries.

Hi sir have been following your work from few days it's outstanding. will soon approach u for investment adviosry, post elections drama settles down. Mean time i have a doubt hope u can clarify it sir.


Scenario 1


there's a person called x & he bought an agricultural land(with his money)long back & later we purchased it from him in this case all we need is Noc's from his kids as its not an ancestral property

Â case closed.


Scenario 2Â 


X is selling he's ancestral property i.e(X grand fathers property)to us where as in this case we need noc from X's brothers,sisters & even there grand children but some times few families due to internal disputes don't clearly mention about no of siblings, once the sale is done after an year or so someone out of the blue files a petition stating this sale deed should be canceled as this transaction took place without his/her notice & even they are one of the legal hire. what can be the solution to avoid this entire scenario can paper ad be a sol.
